title: Target for No Shooting
provenance_text:
Alan Davie [1920-2014], Hertford, England [1]; Gimpel Fils, London, England; C. McKenzie Lewis, Jr. Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, September 1960.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" (no. 120, illustrated in catalogue, plate 89) held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959.
[2]. Mr. Lewis purchased the painting from the International. Payment was made to Gimpel Fils (see copies of relevant information in curatorial file.)
